G

GERMAN - Static variable in annotation type javinator9889.localemanager.utils.languagesupport.LanguagesSupport.Language
 
getCustomSharedPreferences(Context) - Method in class javinator9889.localemanager.application.BaseApplication
You must override this method for using a custom shared preferences with your locale instance.
getLanguage() - Method in class javinator9889.localemanager.localemanager.LocaleManager
Obtains the user custom language - if this value is not set, a default value is returned (LanguagesSupport.Language.SYSTEM value).
getLocale(Resources) - Static method in class javinator9889.localemanager.utils.Utils
Obtains the current locale being used by the system.
getSystemLocale(Configuration) - Static method in class javinator9889.localemanager.utils.Utils
Obtains the Android system locale, even if the user has changed the application one.
GREEK - Static variable in annotation type javinator9889.localemanager.utils.languagesupport.LanguagesSupport.Language
